TopicTitle: The Mighty Saturn V gets a nice poster

Articles.Content:
Recently I have been heavily involved in an ambitious online project on which I work alongside three massive space nerds. Best bunch ever. Their latest challenge for my graphic design skills, called for me to create a poster to commemorate the mighty Saturn V, what with the anniversary approaching (it was when I started), and commemorate it I did. Whether I did so well, is for you guys to decide.  

I considered posting this in the Fan Art section, but I think that's reserved for KSP-related fan art only. 

As is stated in the imgur description, you can get the A3-sized print-ready file, if you leave me a message at [email protected]
